Create an interactive ice cream game that uses augmented reality technology to let you create and taste virtual ice cream flavors.
Organize a virtual ice cream festival that brings together ice cream makers from all over the world to showcase their unique and creative flavors.
Develop a mobile app that allows you to find the best ice cream shops in your area, as well as information about their flavors, ingredients, and prices.
Create an ice cream-themed escape room that challenges you to solve puzzles and riddles while trying to escape before time runs out.
Design an ice cream-themed board game that allows players to collect ingredients, create their own ice cream flavors, and compete with other players to see who can make the best ice cream.
